title: Championship riven
body: Okay so I'm a little confused about the new championship riven are there two seperate skins? and do previouse owners just get a loading screen? And about the crown

replies.body: Anyone who already has CS Riven (right now) will get a loading screen splash border and their skin will be a little different (crown and Ult particles). Anyone who buys it from the store when it comes back out will not get the special border and they'll have the standard skin.
Also previous owners will get both versions of the skin
Ah right, CS Riven and CS Riven 2016 being separate skins.
Do owners of the current CS Riven skin get the 2016 one for free?
So will it look like two different skins they can pick between? Like, "S2 Championship Riven" and "S6 Championship Riven" or something?
Probably. If I had to guess, it would work like chroma skins
Oh okay thanks for explaining it
